channel.title: Server Download Help. ( Which One )
channel.description: I am having a amazing problem trying to pick the right client (+) source to download. The last three I downloaded where absolulty what i wanted when i was reading about them from the forums, but when i actually tried to put my ip in them, the source's messed up or they had locked shit to where i couldn't customize the files. This is what i 100% want: A 100% customizable client (+) source. A 100% recomended client (+) source. " even by staff. " And a client (+) source that is NOT laggy and Fin freezes my people out.

item.title: Server Download Help. ( Which One )
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

[quote=“X Entinity X, post:6, topic:386012”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=481762.msg3528016#msg3528016 date=1299970704]

Hyperion; and use a clean 317-377 client, ask another member on the forums for one because I cannot find the download link.

Also, please don’t demand, ask nicely.

I wouldn’t do that if I was a learner, I always took the easy option like most people did/would, so I picked Delta, from then Project Insanity, then Hyperion then 474 etc…

You make a good point, although you build a certain attachment to servers like those, and it’s really hard to leave them and move on.
[/quote]

Yeh, that’s very true. Personally if I was you Ninja I would just go to www.java.sun.com learn Java and pick the most stable base out there.[/quote]

I have followed vid. after vid. and i have done all that java stuff. But i don’t want to make my “own” server yet. I want to “customize” a server. Thats why i want it to be 100% customizable. You know what nvm. As long as it is customizable to all the last ownership im fine. I just want people to enjoy it knowing that im hosting it. I want a server that is 100% virus free and that when i put my ip in it will actually work!@@!

If you know a Client (+) Source download PLEASE give me the link!@@!!@!!@

Read full topic

item.title: Server Download Help. ( Which One )
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:5, topic:386012”][quote author=X Entinity X link=topic=481762.msg3528012#msg3528012 date=1299970550]

Hyperion; and use a clean 317-377 client, ask another member on the forums for one because I cannot find the download link.

Also, please don’t demand, ask nicely.

I wouldn’t do that if I was a learner, I always took the easy option like most people did/would, so I picked Delta, from then Project Insanity, then Hyperion then 474 etc…
[/quote]
You make a good point, although you build a certain attachment to servers like those, and it’s really hard to leave them and move on.[/quote]

Yeh, that’s very true. Personally if I was you Ninja I would just go to www.java.sun.com learn Java and pick the most stable base out there.

Read full topic
